title: Fragment, late 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic
Technique: 7&1 satin patterned by weft floats
description: Man on horseback carrying a quiver, about to hurl a spear at a crouching lion. Large-scale parrot, stripes, fantastic foliage and architectural forms. Fabric was originally entirely faced with metallic threads, gold and silver.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, late 17th century.
late 17th century. Medium: silk, metallic
Technique: 7&1 satin patterned by weft floats. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-443-a/c.
